content: mushroom lighter pouch by stevie lucas what you will need abbreviations ● about 10 yards medium yarn in chain - chain main color and 2 yards single_crochet - single_crochet contrasting color slip_stitch - slip_stitch ● us size 4/d 3 mm crochet hook st - stitch ● lighter for size ea - each ● stitch marker round - round ● scissors beg - beginning ● tapestry needle gauge 11 sts = 2 ins x 11 row = 2 ins in single_crochet st www etsy com/shop/yourstitcherfriend base chain 4 insert hook in the 2nd chain single_crochet 2 4 single_crochet in 3rd chain turn to work on other side of chain single_crochet 1 single_crochet 3 in last chain mark beg of round work in back loop to work upwards single_crochet 3 2 single_crochet in next 2 sts twice single_crochet for 15 rnds going through both front and back loops when you work in the round the start of the round will shift to the right where you increased on the base will determine where your corners are flatten lighter case single_crochet to closest edge this will help even things out to set up placement for the strap strap chain to desired length for example if you want the pouch to hang around your wrist chain 50 you can make a chain long enough to go around your neck too slip_stitch on opposite side of where you began the chain cut weave in tails www etsy com/shop/yourstitcherfriend cap chain 8 join first st chain 1 to act as 1st st mark beg of round single_crochet 3 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet twice single_crochet increase to marker single_crochet 2 single_crochet in one st increase to marker single_crochet 2 rnds cut and weave in tails spots cut 16 ins of white and thread tapestry needle start in a space between the 1st and 2nd rnds and go in the hole above move 3 spaces to the left and up 1 round pull needle out from inside and insert in hole above move 3 spaces to the left and down 1 round pull needle out from inside and insert in hole below repeat this process until you ve gone around the mushroom cap once if you want bolder spots make a second trip around going in the same spaces tie a tight knot at first spot and cut tails you can add more spots if you wish pull chain through center hole of cap to complete www etsy com/shop/yourstitcherfriend
